rows.label: bf06300100_0010
rows.name: Okay, that should do it.

rows.label: bf06300100_0020
rows.name: Preparations complete!

rows.label: bf06300100_0030
rows.name: What are you talking about, Tora?

rows.label: bf06300100_0040
rows.name: Hmph! Both Drivers and Blades...

rows.label: bf06300100_0050
rows.name: ...use ether energy to fire Arts.

rows.label: bf06300100_0060
rows.name:
Why are you stating the obvious?
That's common knowledge.

rows.label: bf06300100_0070
rows.name: But right now friends cannot, yes?

rows.label: bf06300100_0080
rows.name:
Yeah, there's something
about this room...

rows.label: bf06300100_0090
rows.name:
Hmph! You guys are forgetting
something important.

rows.label: bf06300100_0100
rows.name:
Hey, quit being so secretive
and just tell us!

rows.label: bf06300100_0110
rows.name:
Could be friends forgetting,
Hana is artificial Blade?

rows.label: bf06300100_0120
rows.name:
Why would we forget that? She's
been with us all this time...

rows.label: bf06300100_0130
rows.name: ...Wait! I get it! Her ether furnace!

rows.label: bf06300100_0140
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: bf06300100_0150
rows.name:
Thanks to Nee-sama, Hana can now
generate ether energy by herself.

rows.label: bf06300100_0160
rows.name: Barriers and such don't affect it

rows.label: bf06300100_0170
rows.name:
I transplanted the crystal from
Meleph's sword to Hana's Biter.

rows.label: bf06300100_0180
rows.name:
That crystal have enough energy
stored for one use of Arts.

rows.label: bf06300100_0190
rows.name: And Biter of Hana use Earth element.

rows.label: bf06300100_0200
rows.name:
So through synergy with Fire element of
Meleph, power of Arts is amplified!

rows.label: bf06300100_0210
rows.name:
If we hit it straight on, I doubt
the door can withstand that.

rows.label: bf06300100_0220
rows.name:
Wait a minute... You stored
energy in that crystal?

rows.label: bf06300100_0230
rows.name:
How on earth did you do that
inside this barrier...

rows.label: bf06300100_0240
rows.name: Come to think of it...

rows.label: bf06300100_0250
rows.name:
Meleph-sama hasn't used Arts
even once since we came here.

rows.label: bf06300100_0260
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] Wha-?!

rows.label: bf06300100_0270
rows.name:
Things seemed off from the
moment we entered the palace.

rows.label: bf06300100_0280
rows.name:
So I secretly asked Tora to refrain
from using any Arts either.

rows.label: bf06300100_0290
rows.name: Oho-ho-ho!

rows.label: bf06300100_0300
rows.name: I see now.

rows.label: bf06300100_0310
rows.name:
If they knew Hana could use her powers even
inside the barrier, they would be more cautious.

rows.label: bf06300100_0320
rows.name: Exactly. Here goes. Step back.

rows.label: bf06300100_0330
rows.name: Hold up!

rows.label: bf06300100_0340
rows.name:
If you transferred the crystal from
the sword, what will you fight with?

rows.label: bf06300100_0350
rows.name:
I can generate a new one
from Kagutsuchi's core.

rows.label: bf06300100_0360
rows.name:
...? Don't tell me you
didn't know about that.

rows.label: bf06300100_0370
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] Whoa...

rows.label: bf06300100_0380
rows.name:
You didn't know how Blade
weapons work? Seriously?

rows.label: bf06300100_0390
rows.name: H-how would I know something like that?

rows.label: bf06300100_0400
rows.name: I've never lost or broken my weapon...

rows.label: bf06300100_0410
rows.name: Then I suppose I cannot blame you.

rows.label: bf06300100_0420
rows.name:
Moving along, then...
Tora, Hana, please?

rows.label: bf06300100_0430
rows.name: Leave it to me!

rows.label: bf06300100_0440
rows.name: Here I go!

rows.label: bf06300100_0450
rows.name: Jet Chomp Chomp!!!

rows.label: bf06300100_0460
rows.name: We did it!

rows.label: bf06300100_0470
rows.name: We sure did!

rows.label: bf06300100_0480
rows.name:
That was quite flashy. Guards
will be here in no time.

rows.label: bf06300100_0490
rows.name: Let's hurry!

rows.label: bf06300100_0500
rows.name:
Homura-sama was taken below. Mayhap
somewhere beneath the palace?

rows.label: bf06300100_0510
rows.name: Understood!
